scenario_text.value:
The place you guys are looking for must be in
here.

Garurumon wasn’t lying... I figured he was
setting us up or something.
Now do you believe him?
Sure. I bet he doesn’t even bite, either.

Hmph... Well, we’ve still got a problem.
Those guys over there.

(Garurumon’s looking at a large group of
stragglers from Piemon’s gang...)

Whoa, hold up! That honkin’ chonk of yours
means everyone can see us from a mile away!

Oh, he has a point. Still, it’s not like he
can shrink his body.

Hmph. If smaller is better, then that should
be no issue.

Garurumon, won’t you return to the form you
used to have?
Fine...
Is this better?

That’s the one! Ah, but that takes me back.
My memories come rushing to the surface.
Don’t act so happy about it...
Yo, that look’s pretty cute, ain’t it?
Yeah, there’s definitely a charm to it.

All of you shut your traps. Focus over there,
why don’t you?

As you can see, there’s a ton of them. How do
you plan on getting through?

Rushing in from the front doesn’t seem like
the best idea...

Still, when push comes to shove, what else
can we do?
Sure, but... Hmm. What to do.
